products.name: Silent Hill 2 Zippo Flip Lighter
products.description: Standard-size Zippo featuring Pyramid Head and Bubble Head Nurse designs on either side with the iconic Silent Hill 2 logo. Available in chrome and black variants.
products.longDescription: A stunning lighter showcasing the most iconic creatures from Silent Hill 2. One side features the menacing Pyramid Head while the other displays the haunting Bubble Head Nurse, with the distinctive Silent Hill 2 logo completing this collector's masterpiece. Built with legendary reliability and windproof design for horror fans and collectors alike. This is a standard Zippo size lighter. Ships without lighter fluid - use standard Zippo lighter fluid or Ronsonol fluid for traditional wick operation (or upgrade to butane/electric insert).

butaneInsert.description: Upgrade to butane torch insert for reliable wind-resistant flame

variants.disclaimer: Black color variant is not an official Zippo brand product but nonetheless high quality

products.name: Aphex Twin Logo Zippo Flip Lighter
products.description: Standard-size Aphex Twin electronic music themed lighter with distinctive IDM artwork. Available in chrome and black variants.
products.longDescription: Celebrate the genius of Richard D. James with this exclusive Aphex Twin lighter. Showcasing the distinctive visual style associated with the legendary electronic music producer, this lighter is a must-have for fans of intelligent dance music and experimental electronica. The design captures the essence of Aphex Twin's innovative sound with striking visuals that reflect his influential career spanning ambient, acid, and IDM genres. This is a standard Zippo size lighter. Ships without lighter fluid - use standard Zippo lighter fluid or Ronsonol fluid for traditional wick operation (or upgrade to butane/electric insert).

products.description: Standard-size minimalist Skyrim lighter featuring the iconic Elder Scrolls V logo. Available in chrome and black variants.
products.longDescription: A sleek tribute to Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim featuring the game's distinctive logo in a clean, minimalist design. This high-quality lighter showcases the iconic Skyrim dragon emblem without unnecessary clutter, letting the legendary symbol speak for itself. Perfect for fans who appreciate understated elegance and the timeless appeal of one of gaming's most beloved RPGs. This is a standard Zippo size lighter. Ships without lighter fluid - use standard Zippo lighter fluid or Ronsonol fluid for traditional wick operation (or upgrade to butane/electric insert).
